item.title: First test post
item.description: Simple rpart model on iris library("rpart") library("rpart.plot") tree_model = rpart(Species ~., data = iris) summary(tree_model) ## Call: ## rpart(formula = Species ~ ., data = iris) ## n= 150 ## ## CP nsplit rel error xerror xstd ## 1 0.50 0 1.00 1.14 0.05230679 ## 2 0.44 1 0.50 0.62 0.06031031 ## 3 0.01 2 0.06 0.12 0.03322650 ## ## Variable importance ## Petal.Width Petal.Length Sepal.Length Sepal.Width ## 34 31 21 14 ## ## Node number 1: 150 observations, complexity param=0.
